panels.description: Визуализация объема логов по времени с разбивкой по уровням

targets.expr: sum by(level) (count_over_time({service_name=~"$service"} | json | label_format level=detected_level | user_agent != `Prometheus/3.4.1` [$__interval]))

panels.title: Logs Volume

panels.description: Количество логов по уровням (error, warn, info, debug) и сервисам

targets.expr: sum by(service_name, level) (count_over_time({service_name="$service"} | json | label_format level=detected_level | level = `error` | user_agent != `Prometheus/3.4.1` [1m]))
sum by(service_name, level) (count_over_time({service_name="$service"} | json | label_format level=detected_level | level = `warn` | user_agent != `Prometheus/3.4.1` [1m]))
sum by(service_name, level) (count_over_time({service_name="$service"} | json | label_format level=detected_level | level = `info` | user_agent != `Prometheus/3.4.1` [1m]))
sum by(service_name, level) (count_over_time({service_name="$service"} | json | label_format level=detected_level | level = `debug` | user_agent != `Prometheus/3.4.1` [1m]))

panels.title: Количество логов по уровням и сервисам
